sen.j: 稲葉 正誼（いなば まさよし、文政10年3月2日 (旧暦)（1827年3月28日） - 嘉永元年10月22日 (旧暦)（1848年11月17日））は、山城国淀藩の第11代藩主。
sen.e: Masayoshi INABA (March 28, 1827 - October 17, 1848) was the 11th lord of Yodo domain of the Yamashiro Province.
Masayoshi INABA (March 28, 1827 - October 17, 1848) was the 11th lord of Yodo Domain of the Yamashiro Province.
Masayoshi INABA (March 28, 1827 - November 17, 1848) was the 11th lord of Yodo Domain of the Yamashiro Province.
He was the 15th grand master of the Inaba family with ties to Masanari
He was the 15th grand master of the Inaba family with ties to Masanari.
sen.cmt: ピリオド補足しました。
sen.e: He was the 15th grand master of the Inaba family with ties to Masanari.

sen.j: 越後国高田藩主・榊原政令の七男。
sen.e: He was the seventh son of Masanori SAKAKIBARA, the Lord of the Takada Domain in the Echigo Province.
He was the seventh son of Masanori SAKAKIBARA, the Lord of the Takada Domain in the Echigo Province.
He was the seventh son of Masanori SAKAKIBARA, the Lord of the Takada Domain in the Echigo Province.
His rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).

His rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
He was Tango no kuni no kami (the governor of Tango Province).
He was Tango no kuni no kami (the governor of Tango Province).
He was Tango no kuni no kami (the governor of Tango Province).
He was born on March 28, 1827.
He was born on March 28, 1827.
He was born on March 28, 1827.

sen.j: 天保13年（1842年）7月20日、家督を継いだ。
sen.e: He took over as head of the family on August 25, 1842.
He took over as head of the family on August 25, 1842.
He took over as head of the family on August 25, 1842.

sen.j: 嘉永元年（1848年）10月22日、22歳で死去し、養嗣子の稲葉正邦が後を継いだ。
sen.e: On November 17, 1848, he died at age 22, and his adopted heir Masakuni INABA succeeded.
On November 17, 1848, he died at age 22, and his adopted heir Masakuni INABA succeeded.
